content.question: Which of the following pieces of evidence does the author use to support his claim that the arrival of the Spanish “destroyed our people”?

choices.label: The Spanish spread infectious disease among the Maya.
The Spanish conquered all Maya towns.
The Spanish assassinated the king’s eldest son.

content.answer: The Spanish conquered all Maya towns.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
